name: Viet Fun 3 Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Vietfun 3 hotel for 3 nights for our second stay in Hanoi. Previously we had been at Especen which was nice and clean but nothing special.
reviews.title: Good hotel with excellent staff

reviews.text: We liked the area though, close to st Josephs cathedral. It's a little less hectic than some parts of the old quarter.
reviews.title: Great service

description: Viet Fun 3 Hotel is the right choice for all astute tourists & business travellers alike.
